title: Cartoony Sans Serif Typeface
content:
Hi there!

Does anyone know what typeface is used for "and nobody noticed the mouse" ?  
Many thanks in advance for any help or pointers you can give.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_mj5wjuKRnZ1qh9iydo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819220123/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mj5wjuKRnZ1qh9iydo1_1280.jpg) | 563.27 KB |
author: caperobin

comments.content: This is very close to [Kabel Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819220123/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/kabel+ultra) but some details look off such as counters, /i dot, /b stem... May be a modified version of it...
good grief there are a ton of commercial fonts that look just like kabel.
Thanks so much Ryuk and defiantone for your help!
